events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but decided I want to return it because it doesn't fit well and I would like a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's desire to return the product and receive money back.
An agent specialized in refunds has been assigned to handle your case regarding the jacket return.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with the return and refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
My order number is 7845123. The jacket is brand new, only tried on once, and is in perfect condition without any damage.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund promptly.
That sounds perfect, thank you! I appreciate the quick assistance and will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We've emailed you the prepaid return label and instructions. Your refund will be processed within 5 business days after we receive the jacket.
Just following up to check if you have sent the jacket back and if everything is going smoothly with your refund process.
Yes, I returned the jacket yesterday and already received confirmation that it arrived at your facility. Thank you for the support!
Your refund has been processed and should appear in your account within 3-5 business days. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our short survey about your experience with our return and refund service.
I completed the survey and Iâ€™m very satisfied with how my refund was handled. Thanks again for the great service.
Thank you for your feedback. We are closing your case now. Feel free to reach out if you have any other questions or concerns.
